summary: the queen 's guard was left red-faced after he slipped on a manhole cover during the popular changing of the guard at buckingham palace last week . he lost his footing on the side of the box and dropping his rifle . the embarrassed soldier is thought to have slipped because of the metal protectors .
aspect: [1] A Buckingham Palace guard slipped on a manhole cover during the Changing of the Guard. [2] The embarrassed guard quickly scrambled to his feet as his colleagues marched past. [3] Tourist David Meadwell recorded the incident and it went viral. [4] The guard's legs appeared to get tangled as he tried to turn and he fell heavily to the floor. [5] The unidentified young guard's embarrassment was evident. [6] The guard may have slipped because of metal protectors on his boots. [7] The incident happened in front of hundreds of tourists who were watching the Changing of the Guard.
